name: The Dreary Desert's Marvellous Mountain
description:
Travelling through the desert is hot and bothersome! It feels like you've swallowed a whole container's worth of sand... When suddenly, what's that in the distance? An oasis! Water! And a nice little village, too! Unfortunately, the inhabitants and your fellow travellers aren't too willing to share this paradise...

Then again, neither are you, so there's only one thing to do...
